EncodedAudioChunk.summary: The EncodedAudioChunk interface of the represents a chunk of encoded audio data.

EncodedAudioChunkEncodedAudioChunk.summary: The EncodedAudioChunk() constructor creates a new object representing a chunk of encoded audio.

EncodedAudioChunkByteLength.summary: The byteLength read-only property of the interface returns the length in bytes of the encoded audio data.

EncodedAudioChunkCopyTo.summary: The copyTo() method of the interface copies the encoded chunk of audio data.

EncodedAudioChunkDuration.summary: The duration read-only property of the interface returns an integer indicating the duration of the audio in microseconds.

EncodedAudioChunkType.summary: The type read-only property of the interface returns a value indicating whether the audio chunk is a key chunk, which does not relying on other frames for decoding.

EncodedAudioChunkTimestamp.summary: The timestamp read-only property of the interface returns an integer indicating the timestamp of the audio in microseconds.
